def_en: If you say that something is charming, you mean that it is very pleasant or attractive.

def_cn: 和蔼可亲的;富有魅力的;讨人喜爱的
def_en: If you describe someone as charming, you mean they behave in a friendly, pleasant way that makes people like them.

def_cn: (对于别人的粗鲁行为或听到他人劣迹时表示不赞同)岂有此理！
def_en: You can say 'Charming!' to indicate your disapproval when someone has just been rude to you or told you about someone's bad behaviour.
